function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation in open plan offices and schools","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne disease transmission and spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Implementing localized air extraction systems, floor-level extraction, and flexible office layouts","Technologies":"Ventilation systems with multiple outlet duct patterns, air pillars, and mid-floor grilles","People":"Staff, students, and teachers in open plan offices and schools","Owner":"Management, building owners, and school districts"}]}
